devdoc.author: Neverland
devdoc.details: Provides market data, circulating supply, and price discovery via Uniswap integration

params.updatedAt: Timestamp when the answer was updated

params.fromUniswap: True if the price came from Uniswap, false if hardcoded
params.timestamp: Block timestamp when the price was updated

params.teamAddresses: Array of team addresses to add

returns.data: MarketData struct with supplies, price and caps

returns.fromUniswap: Whether the price came from Uniswap

returns.isFromUniswap: True if the price comes from Uniswap
returns.isStale: True if the cached price is stale
returns.lastUpdate: Cache timestamp of last price update

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.teamAddresses: Array of team addresses to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: NeverlandDustHelper

AddressZero().notice: Used when a zero address is provided where not allowed.

AnswerUpdated(int256,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted for Chainlink-compatibility when the answer changes

PriceLimitsUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the reasonable price limits are updated

PriceUpdateIntervalChanged(uint256,uint2.notice: Emitted when the cache invalidation interval changes

PriceUpdated(uint256,uint256,uint256,boo.notice: Emitted when the cached price is updated

TeamAddressAdded(address).notice: Emitted when a team address is added to the exclusion list

TeamAddressRemoved(address).notice: Emitted when a team address is removed from the exclusion list

TeamAddressesBatchAdded(address[]).notice: Emitted when multiple team addresses are added

TeamAddressesBatchRemoved(address[]).notice: Emitted when multiple team addresses are removed

UniswapPairUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when the Uniswap pair used for price discovery changes

DEFAULT_DUST_PRICE().notice: Default DUST price in USD (8 decimals) - $0.25

PRICE_DECIMALS().notice: Price decimals (8 decimals to match standard oracles)

constructor.notice: Initializes the helper with token and owner

decimals().notice: Get number of decimals used by price (8)

getDustValueInUSD(uint256).notice: Convert DUST (18 decimals) to USD value (8 decimals)

getPriceInfo().notice: Detailed price info and cache state

getRoundData(uint80).notice: Get round data by round ID

getTeamAddressCount().notice: Get the number of team addresses

getTeamTotalBalance().notice: Sum of balances held by all team addresses

getUSDValueInDust(uint256).notice: Convert USD value (8 decimals) to DUST (18 decimals)

hardcodedPrice().notice: Current hardcoded DUST price in USD (8 decimals)

isPriceCacheStale().notice: Check if price cache is stale

priceUpdateInterval().notice: Price update interval (1 hour for production readiness)

teamAddresses(uint256).notice: Array of team addresses for iteration

uniswapPair().notice: Uniswap pair address for price discovery (zero means use hardcoded)

userdoc.notice: Production-ready oracle and helper contract for DUST token
